lines.text: Do you all know what the temperature is here?
Cold.
Back when I left home, nice girls didn't go into show business. Least not where I come from.
Oh, nothing. Just things on my mind.
Well, better than nothing there.
Are you crazy? I'm not going in here. Axe murderers hang out in places like this.
I have Axe-murderer spray in my purse.
You really don't have to lay an egg to know it?s rotten.
I wish we had a radio.
I'll give you the news. Tennessee's under ten feet of snow.
I mean for music.
She taught me that real music didn't come from your throat. It's God, putting a holiday in your heart.
You're my Grandpa's favorite singer!
Oh, honey, I'm everyone's grandpa's favorite singer.
Then I started seeing headlines, ?Singer - kidnapped by maniacs.?
Didn't you used to be Faith Shawn?
No, I wasn't! Didn't you used to be sober?
Now, where was I?
Are you testing me?
It?s the medicine. She doesn't know what she's saying.
I do too, Avery.
She's 16!
I know the numbers.
Reba does it and she can walk into any Walmart in the nation.
You think?
I know.
No more changes, I don't even care if the president calls.
I do!
She sat in the same seat, rain or shine.
Why do people always show you things that hurt you?
You mean we're stuck here?
Looks that way, ma'am.
Well, Of course she was there when I was born. I wasn't there when she was.
That?s a point.
Don't you know this cross has scared a few people half to death when it come on way out here?
Why did you do it?
Memory.
Get in. Get in. I was afraid you wouldn't recognize me.
Are you kidding?
Get in. My lord child. You are slow. We got a lot of ground to cover.
Ok, I think you're in.
Got such itty-bitty things on wheels nowadays. Ain't no space for a real car.
How did Grandpa Luther get that cotton on his cheeks?
At least we're safe in here. When we don't get to where we're supposed to be, they'll send people for us.
Well. Well, now... Miss Singin' Star, what makes you think so? Huh? You heard any cars pass by out there in the last, what? Six hours?
